channel.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
channel.description:
Ok, i'v added a shop, no errors in the client. (well, there were, but i fixed) Done the autospawn, and the in the shop, put the right thing.
And after i do Compile, when it runs the server it says
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue . . . ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- / \ / Now starting server... \ / \ ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Starting PvpScape on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 @red@Barrows_FTW! 2 2 6585 1000" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:30) ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.111.131.231:1437 ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:1736 Client type: low memory version UserId: 86492073 Joe is signing onto server and connecting from: localhost Client type: low memory version UserId: 84074830 Lord Temuz is signing onto server and connecting from: 5.111.131.231 ClientHandler: Accepted from 5.112.170.5:4108

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @Aces316rocks Aces316rocks
item.description:
@Aces316rocks wrote:

Make sure you copied a new npc off the list or copy another one already on their and then modify. May I ask the NPC number? Some don’t work. I doubt you messed up with the shop bbut pherhaps it was the shopkepper itself or the client.java adding the npc.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @kazza kazza
item.description:
@kazza wrote:

remove the recent shops youve added.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @Joe_w000 Joe w000
item.description:
@Joe_w000 wrote:

Im using cassie, it worked yesterday, but i had to redo the server, and now it doesnt work.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 09:02:21 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

What npc you using for the shop? Some npc kick you when trading, thats why always click TALK instead of Trade, but make sure you using a npc that works, like fairy, or customer, or aubury or santa or…

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @Joe_w000 Joe w000
item.description:
@Joe_w000 wrote:

Ok, so not to many spaces
Ty.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 08:49:51 AM[/size][hr]Well, i dont get that, but when i click “trade” it disconnects me, and everyone who does it.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

k just found out something
try deleting all tabs between FTW and the first 2, then, just do 1 tab, sometimes you do a tab tomany and it wont work.
I mean changing this

@red@Barrows_FTW! 2 2 6585
1000"

to

@red@Barrows_FTW! 2 2 6585 1000

Hop THAT helps

Read full topic

item.title: Shop Error. Some help please? :)
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Try taking out the @red@ part, if that doesn’t help, take out the !
I can’t think of anything else that might be wrong.

Read full topic
